strapiPost.title: Kids Fishing Tournament Coming to Beaver Lake.
strapiPost.content:
Get your kids' rods and reels ready, because the Beaver Watershed Alliance and NWA CastMasters are putting on a youth-focused fishing tournament at Beaver Lake.

  • Fun for all: Teams will be comprised of one adult and 2 youths, and registration will cost $50. Not only will teams get to enjoy the great outdoors, but over $5,000 in prizes will be awarded to tournament winners and giveaway recipients.
  • More than fishing: In addition to giving youth an outlet to enjoy a great day on the lake, the Beaver Watershed Alliance and NWA CastMasters aim for this to be an educational event and to fundraise for youth programming.

If you want to learn more about this event or register, go here.
